attributes.action:
Open the gyms alot earlier than 12th of April.
The gym IS an essential service
attributes.additional_details: Get the gyms open as early as possible
attributes.background:
We want the gyms to open earlier than the 12th of April. The gym is an essential service that the people need,  as we all know, So why should the gym be treated like the local pub or hair dressers?
The gym isnt and shouldn't be in the same category.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956
